messages.title: Make Change Happen
messages.content: Ross Thomson, Conservative Candidate for Gordon, has called upon Lib Dem and SNP voters to join him in his campaign for change

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Campaigning to upgrade the A96 and A90
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ross has been campaigning for the dualling of the A96 and A90 and has launched an online petition at www.ipetitions.com/petitions/dualthea96anda90.
Ross has been outspoken about the state of our roads. There are too many potholes which not only look terrible but cause real damage too.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ken Clarke MP, Shadow Business Secretary

issues.economy: Ross discussed with [Ken Clarke MP] the vital importance of the Oil and Gas industry to Gordon.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ross Thomson, Conservative candidate for Gordon, calls upon Lib Dem and SNP voters to join him in his campaign for change

contactInformation.address: Gordon Conservatives, 7 Northern Road, Kintore, Aberdeenshire, AB51 0YL

endorsements.endorser: Nanette - Member of the Scottish Parliament
endorsements.endorsement: Ross is someone who will make a real difference for communities across Gordon and will be a powerful voice in Westminster. He has real drive and I have every confidence he will work hard and do his best for the people of Gordon.
I was a member of the Lib Dems but I’ve decided to vote Conservative because Britain needs real change in Westminster, and only the Conservatives can do that.
I’m supporting Ross because he works hard for local people. Ross delivers on what he promises and I know he will stand up for people like us and make the change we need happen.

quotes.text: Ross delivers on what he promises and I know he will stand up for people like us and make the change we need happen.

images.caption: Ross Thomson at a potholed road.
Ross Thomson holding a sign to upgrade A96 and A90.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains endorsements from a member of the Scottish Parliament, a student, and a retired individual. It also features a campaign update section with various news briefs, including campaigning efforts and interactions with political figures.
